Deskins Concrete Ltd.

Deskins Concrete Ltd. has been the number one name in curb since 1962. Covering much of Ohio, Indiana and Northern Kentucky, we specialize in slipform curbs, curb and gutter and extruded curb. For over half of a century, Deskins Concrete Ltd. has consistently exceeded the expectations of our clients with speed and efficiency, offering a level of service and quality that is unparalleled.

Find Out More

Two Generations of Slipform Curb Experts

Deskins Concrete Ltd. was established in 1962 by Woodrow L. Deskins Sr., who is still very active in the company today. In 1992, he was joined by Woodrow Jr. and Franklin, and in 2000, Deskins Concrete Ltd. became a Limited Partnership. Over the years Deskins Concrete Ltd. has experienced much success. In 2006 multiple crews were started, alliances with quality conscious subcontractors were established and new facilities were built.

A lot has changed over the years; Deskins Concrete Ltd. now offers grading, underdrain, and complete concrete site packages. Multiple hand form and slipform curb crews run everyday allowing Deskins Concrete Ltd. to perform on several jobs in different cities at the same time.

“Do what you do best, and stick to what you know”

- Has been our philosophy and remains so today.

We look forward to a successful future, and continuing to provide our expertise to our customers and their projects.

We specialize in curbs, and also offer a wide range of site concrete related items. Our estimating staff will be glad to customize any proposal to meet your needs, according to plans and specs, or as a specific project requires. Call or email anytime for very fast service.
